ABUSERS.Defintion: people who treat others in a cruel and unfair way

AGENDA.Defintion: ideas that a party or country things are important

APARTHEID.Defintion: the system in South Africa which separated different races

BINDING.Defintion: (of a law or agreement) must be kept

CHERRY-PICKED.Defintion: picked only the best or preferred things out of a larger group

CODIFIED.Defintion: documented in writing, in the law

CONSTITUTES.Defintion: forms, is considered a part of

DEGRADING.Defintion: unpleasant and causing someone to feel like they have no value

FUNDAMENTALLY.Defintion: in a basic but important way

INHERENTLY.Defintion: in a way that is natural and basic

JAUNT.Defintion: a short journey, normally for fun

OPPRESSOR.Defintion: someone who treats someone else unfairly and prevents them from having the same rights as other people

PERSECUTION.Defintion: treat someone unfairly over a long period of time, normally because of their religion or race

POINT THE FINGER.Defintion: assigning blame, saying someone is responsible

PUT THIS DECLARATION UP ON A PEDESTAL.Defintion: say that something (this declaration) is fantastic

REIGN.Defintion: the period of time that someone was king or queen

SOWED THE SEEDS.Defintion: do something that causes something to happen in the future

TRACE.Defintion: go back in time to find something

VIOLATION.Defintion: an action that breaks a law, agreement, or principle
